# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/script_values/GH_magic_modifier_duration_values.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

# Modifier Duration Years to Days Conversion

GH_magic_modifier_years_to_days_value = {
	value = 0
	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:years }
		add = scope:years
		multiply = 365
	}
}

# Modifier Durations
magic_health_gain_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
magic_health_gain_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_health_gain_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_health_gain_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_stewardship_loss_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
magic_stewardship_loss_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_stewardship_loss_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_stewardship_loss_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = { magic_dynasty_opinion_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }

}
magic_murder_scheme_power_add_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_murder_scheme_power_add_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_murder_scheme_power_add_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	value = 5
	if = {

}
magic_trait_synergy_shy_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_trait_synergy_shy_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_trait_synergy_shy_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_trait_synergy_honest_duration_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}

}
magic_hard_casualty_modifier_loss_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_hard_casualty_modifier_loss_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_hard_casualty_modifier_loss_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {

		}
	}
}
magic_monthly_dynasty_prestige_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
magic_monthly_dynasty_prestige_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_monthly_dynasty_prestige_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_monthly_dynasty_prestige_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_monthly_dynasty_prestige_mult_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 5

				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
improve_agriculture_magic_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
improve_agriculture_magic_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = improve_agriculture_magic_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { improve_agriculture_magic_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_ruined_agriculture_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 2
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}

	value = magic_ruined_agriculture_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_ruined_agriculture_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health

				max = 30
				min = 0

}
magic_unnatural_shaping_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_unnatural_shaping_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_unnatural_shaping_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = { magic_intrigue_lifestyle_xp_gain_mult_negative_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_learning_lifestyle_xp_gain_mult_negative_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override

	}
}
magic_virility_opinion_modifier_artifact_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_virility_opinion_modifier_artifact_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_virility_opinion_modifier_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_learning_resistance_gain_modifier_artifact_duration_value = {
	value = -1
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
magic_learning_resistance_gain_modifier_artifact_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_learning_resistance_gain_modifier_artifact_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_learning_resistance_gain_modifier_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)

				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}

				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
religious_fanaticism_artifact_duration_value = {
	value = -1
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
religious_fanaticism_artifact_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = religious_fanaticism_artifact_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { religious_fanaticism_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	if = {
		limit = { magic_trait_synergy_chaste_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_trait_synergy_lustful_artifact_duration_value = {
	value = -1
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}

				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}

				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_trait_synergy_temperate_artifact_duration_value = {
	value = -1
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
magic_trait_synergy_temperate_artifact_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_trait_synergy_temperate_artifact_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_trait_synergy_temperate_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

}
movement_speed_positive_modifier_artifact_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = movement_speed_positive_modifier_artifact_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { movement_speed_positive_modifier_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	value = -1
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}

	value = magic_monthly_piety_loss_mult_modifier_artifact_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_monthly_piety_loss_mult_modifier_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_monthly_prestige_modifier_artifact_duration_value = {

	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}

	if = {
		limit = { magic_boneshaping_modifier_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	value = -1
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }

	}

	}
}
magic_learning_lifestyle_xp_gain_mult_negative_modifier_artifact_duration_value = {
	value = -1
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}
magic_learning_lifestyle_xp_gain_mult_negative_modifier_artifact_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_learning_lifestyle_xp_gain_mult_negative_modifier_artifact_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_learning_lifestyle_xp_gain_mult_negative_modifier_artifact_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

}
magic_constructs_improvement_add_modifier_duration_ai_weighting_value = {
	value = magic_constructs_improvement_add_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_constructs_improvement_add_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
magic_magical_improvement_add_modifier_duration_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = var:spell_effect_duration_override }
		value = var:spell_effect_duration_override
	}
}

	value = magic_magical_improvement_add_modifier_duration_value
	if = {
		limit = { magic_magical_improvement_add_modifier_duration_value = -1 }
		value = 30	# Permanent modifiers are valued at effectively being 30 years long...

			limit = {
				exists = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.age > 50
				scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health < death_chance_dying_health
			}
			subtract = { # ...but the older and closer to natural death one is, the less important they are (exceptions exist, such as modifiers that actually *extend lifespan*)
				value = death_chance_dying_health
				subtract = scope:spell_being_checked_ai_target.health
				multiply = 10
				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}

				max = 30
				min = 0
			}
		}
	}

# Custom Modifier Values
enemy_knight_kill_chance_modifier_value = {
	value = 0
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_1 }
		add =  10
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_2 }
		add =  20
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_3 }
		add =  30
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_4 }
		add =  40
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_5 }
		add =  50
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_6 }
		add =  60
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_7 }
		add =  70
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_8 }
		add =  80
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_9 }
		add =  90
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_character_modifier = enemy_knight_kill_chance_magic_modifier_10 }
		add =  100
	}
}
battle_death_chance_modifier_value = {
	value = 0
	if = {

# Trait XP Change Amounts
scarred_xp_change_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override }
		value = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override
	}
}
scarred_xp_base_value = {
	value = scarred_xp_change_value
	multiply = spell_tag_scalar_threshold_diff_value
}
lifestyle_physician_xp_change_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override }
		value = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override
	}
}

	value = lifestyle_physician_xp_change_value
	multiply = spell_tag_scalar_threshold_diff_value
}

	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override }
		value = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override
	}
}

	value = lifestyle_reveler_xp_change_value
	multiply = spell_tag_scalar_threshold_diff_value
}

	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override }
		value = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override
	}
}
gh_ritual_tattoos_xp_base_value = {
	value = gh_ritual_tattoos_xp_change_value
	multiply = spell_tag_scalar_threshold_diff_value
}
lifestyle_mystic_xp_change_value = {
	value = 5
	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override }
		value = scope:spell_effect.var:spell_effect_xp_change_override
	}
}
lifestyle_mystic_xp_base_value = {
	value = lifestyle_mystic_xp_change_value
	multiply = spell_tag_scalar_threshold_diff_value
}

# Other Script Values
add_diplomacy_lifestyle_xp_spell_effect_value = {
	value = major_lifestyle_xp
	if = {
		limit = { exists = scope:spell_effect }
		multiply = scope:spell_effect.spell_tag_scalar_threshold_diff_value
	}
}

    max = 6
}
